Name: Dragonlord
Description: After 8 seconds of combat, the Dragon strikes the board, dealing true damage to enemies and granting all allies Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
Buffs: 2 - 5 Health% damage, 20% / 3 - 10 Health% damage, 30% / 4 - 15 Health% damage and Stuns for 1.5 seconds. / 5 - 25 Health% damage, 40% /

Name: Dryad
Description: Dryads gain Ability Power and Health. Each enemy death grants additional Health.
Buffs: 2 - 10 AP + 4 HP per enemy death / 4 - 20 AP + 8 HP per enemy death / 6 - 30 AP + 12 HP per enemy death /

Name: Fated
Description: Hover and drop one Fated unit over another to form a pair and unlock a Fated Bonus. Your pair gains bonus HP .
Buffs: 3 - Pair gets the Fated Bonus. / 5 - All Fated champions get 120% of the Fated Bonus / 7 - All Fated champions get 250% of the Fated Bonus /

Name: Fortune
Description: When you lose a fight, gain Luck. Lose Luck when you win.
Buffs: 3 - The more fights in a row you lose, the more Luck you get. / 5 - Heal 2 player health at the start of each player combat. / 7 - Each Festival, roll a new die. /

Name: Ghostly
Description: Upon dealing or taking damage 7 times, Ghostly units send 2 spectres to haunt nearby enemies and heal 4.5% max Health every 2 seconds.
Buffs: 2 - 5% per spectre / 4 - 11% per spectre / 6 - 18% per spectre / 8 - 36% per spectre /

Name: Heavenly
Description: Heavenly champions grant a unique stat bonus to your team, increased by their star level and each Heavenly unit in play.
Buffs: 2 - 100% bonus / 3 - 114% bonus / 4 - 139% bonus / 5 - 164% bonus / 6 - 189% bonus / 7 - 220% bonus /

Name: Inkshadow
Description: Gain unique Inkshadow items. Inkshadow champions gain bonus damage and damage reduction.
Buffs: 3 - 1 Item 5% bonus damage and damage reduction / 5 - 2 Items 7% bonus damage and damage reduction / 7 - 4 Items, 10% bonus damage and damage reduction /

Name: Mythic
Description: Mythic champions gain Health, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.
Buffs: 3 - +11 Health%, 10 AP / 5 - +18 Health%, 15 AP / 7 - +25 Health%, 20 AP / 10 - Instantly become Epic. The bonus is increased by 200% instead. /

Name: Porcelain
Description: After casting, Porcelain champions boil, gaining Attack Speed and taking less damage for 3 seconds.
Buffs: 2 - 30 AS% + 15% reduced damage / 4 - 60 AS% + 20% reduced damage / 6 - 100 AS% + 30% reduced damage /

Name: Storyweaver
Description: Storyweavers summon a Hero named Kayle and evolve her. Storyweavers gain max Health.
Buffs: 3 - Pick a supportive effect. 60 Health / 5 - Pick a combat effect. 100 Health / 7 - Pick a combat effect. 150 Health / 10 - Ascend. 250 Health /

Name: Umbral
Description: The moon illuminates hexes, Shielding units placed in them at the start of combat.
Buffs: 2 - 250 Shield + 12% Health execute / 4 - 500 Shield + 20% Health execute / 6 - 750 Shield and illuminate the whole board / 8 - Executed enemies have a 100% chance to drop loot; 25% Health execute /

Name: Altruist
Description: Altruists heal the lowest Health ally for 15% of damage they deal. Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist.
Buffs: 2 - 10 Armor and Magic Resist / 3 - 25 Armor and Magic Resist / 4 - 40 Armor and Magic Resist /

Name: Arcanist
Description: Arcanists gain Ability Power and grant Ability Power to allies.
Buffs: 2 - 20 to all allies. / 4 - 40 for Arcanists; 20 for others / 6 - 80 for Arcanists; 40 for others / 8 - 120 for Arcanists; 100 for others /

Name: Artist
Description: The Artist paints the champion you place in a special bench slot. Get a 1-star copy of the champion placed there when the Artist's work is complete.
Buffs: 1 - Bonus Effect /

Name: Behemoth
Description: Behemoths gain increased Armor and Magic Resist. Whenever a Behemoth dies, the nearest Behemoth gains 50% more for 5 seconds.
Buffs: 2 - 30 Armor and Magic Resist / 4 - 45 Armor and Magic Resist / 6 - 80 Armor and Magic Resist /

Name: Bruiser
Description: Your team gains 100 maximum Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.
Buffs: 2 - 20% / 4 - 40% / 6 - 70% / 8 - 85%; Every 4 seconds, Bruisers deal 6% max HP bonus physical damage on their next attack. /

Name: Duelist
Description: Duelists gain Attack Speed on each attack, stacking up to 12 times.
Buffs: 2 - 5% Attack Speed / 4 - 9% Attack Speed / 6 - 12% Attack Speed. Duelists take 12% less damage /

Name: Exalted
Description: Your team gains 5% bonus damage, plus more based on your level
Buffs: 3 - 1% damage per level / 5 - 3% damage per level /

Name: Great
Description: Every 3 casts, Wukong grows his weapon, modifying his Abilities.
Buffs: 1 - Bonus Effect /

Name: Invoker
Description: Every 3 seconds, your units gain Mana.
Buffs: 2 -  5 to all / 4 - Additional 15 to Invokers / 6 - 15 to all, additional 15 to Invokers /

Name: Lovers
Description: Change which Lover takes the field depending on whether they are placed in the front or back 2 rows. When the fielded Lover casts, the other provides a bonus effect.
Buffs: 1 - Bonus Effect /

Name: Reaper
Description: Reapers' Abilities can critically strike and they gain Critical Strike Chance.
Buffs: 2 - 20% Critical Strike Chance / 4 - Additionally, Reapers' bleed enemies for 60% bonus true damage over 3 seconds. /

Name: Sage
Description: Combat start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain Omnivamp. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.
Buffs: 2 - 11% Omnivamp, 15 AP / 3 - 18% Omnivamp, 30 AP / 4 -  30% Omnivamp, 45 AP / 5 - 44% Omnivamp, 70 AP /

Name: Sniper
Description: Innate: Snipers gain 1 Attack Range.
Buffs: 2 - 7% damage per hex. / 4 - 14% damage per hex. / 6 - 30% damage per hex. /

Name: Spirit Walker
Description: The first time the Spirit Walker Udyr drops below 50% Health, he unleashes the rage within, healing to full Health, gaining increased movement speed, and changing his Ability from Ram Slam to Tiger Strikes.
Buffs: 1 - Bonus Effect /

Name: Trickshot
Description: Trickshots' abilities ricochet. Each ricochet deals a percentage of the previous bounce's damage.
Buffs: 2 - 1 ricochet; 40% of previous damage / 4 - 2 ricochets; 50% of previous damage /

Name: Warden
Description: Wardens gain Damage Reduction. For the first 10 seconds of combat, they gain an additional 12% Damage Reduction.
Buffs: 2 - 14% Damage Reduction / 4 - 26% Damage Reduction / 6 - 38% Damage Reduction /
